SearchFavorite
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RootSearch> <Search Name="Favorites" GUID="{A70B9F0E-14CD-4c03-B8FE-21C644DC2D5E}" PkgGUID="-1" Type="0" LnksToObj="0" CustomSearch="1" AddinAndMethodName=""> <SrchOn> <RootTable Filter="select o.ea_Id As CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, o.Name, o.stereotype, o.object_type As [EAType], 'Element' As [Type]
from t_object o inner join t_xref x on (o.EA_GUID = x.client)
where Type = 'Favorite'
UNION
select d.ea_Id As CLASSGUID, d.Diagram_Type as CLASSTYPE, d.Name, d.stereotype, d.diagram_type, 'Diagram' 
from t_diagram d inner join t_xref x on (d.EA_GUID = x.client)
where Type = 'Favorite'
UNION
select a.ea_Id As CLASSGUID, 'Attribute' as CLASSTYPE, a.Name, a.stereotype, 'Attribute','' 
from t_attribute a inner join t_xref x on (a.EA_GUID = x.client)
where x.Type = 'Favorite'
UNION
select op.ea_Id As CLASSGUID, 'Operation' as CLASSTYPE, op.Name, op.stereotype, 'Operation','' 
from t_operation op inner join t_xref x on (op.EA_GUID = x.client)
where x.Type = 'Favorite'
order by 3,4" Type="-1"> <TableName Display="Custom SQL Search" Name="" /> <TableHierarchy Display="" Hierarchy="" /> </RootTable> </SrchOn> <LnksTo /> </Search> </RootSearch>
